A1_INTRO_TITLE: Let's get started on your application for
A2_OVERVIEW_TITLE: Here's what to expect for this application.
A2_OVERVIEW_P1: First we'll ask about you and the people you live with.
A2_OVERVIEW_P2: Then we'll talk about your household's status and income.
A2_OVERVIEW_P3: You'll get a chance to review before you submit your application.
A2_OVERVIEW_WARNING: Warning: Only apply once per lottery, duplicate applications will be disqualified.
